new_dialogue:
S3: Do you know anything about the Mid-autumn Festival?
S2:
reply: Yes, It falls on the 15th day of the eighth lunar month . It is said that there is a beautiful goddess Chang ' E on the moon who had eaten some sort of elixir and had to depart her husband . She is always expecting to see her husband again . So , later we have the traditional idea that when there is the full moon , it is time for the family members to come together .
crucial_reply: 15th eighth lunar month goddess chang ' E moon eaten elixir full moon together
